code: import React from'react';import useProducts from'../hooks/useProduct';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductList=()=>{const{products,loading,error}=useProducts();if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Chargement..."});if(error)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Erreur: ",error]});if(!products||!Array.isArray(products)){console.error('Products data:',products);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Aucun produit disponible"});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-4",children:products.map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"border p-4 rounded-lg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.image,alt:product.name,className:"w-full h-48 object-cover"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-bold mt-2",children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-600",children:product.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-lg font-bold mt-2",children:[product.price,"\u20AC"]})]},product._id))});};export default ProductList;
